name: Super mario bros. run (v3)
description:
-STORY-

One day Bowser makes Kamek create a potion for endless running. Bowser puts the potion in Mario and Luigi's pasta one day! Help Mario dodge, twist, and turn through this horrible curse!

( If laggy play here: https://turbowarp.org/720101428 )

|Ready to play! (v.1) - I had just shared the game.|

|The Brothers (v.2) - I added Luigi! I also added fixes and coins.|

|Shoot n' run (v.3) - I've added fire flowers!|

Mabey different worlds + a map in the future...

[CREDITS]

Me - most of the coding

@itfhtt - losing mechanic

Nintendo - sprites ( duh )
